1.content:
Chris - http://s1035.photobucket.com/albums/a434...

Your name is Chris and you are 18 years old. You have very short brown hair, brown eyes and, light brown skin. You stand about 5'9 and 135lbs. And you are half white/half Hispanic. You are down in your basement looking for a pair of jumper cables for your car. You were supposed to meet this really hot girl in another hour to go watch a movie, but your piece of junk on wheels says otherwise. You search thru all the boxes and various junk for about 15 minutes until you discover something under a tarp that catches your attention. You walk over to it and remove the tarp, revealing a weird looking machine that is fitted with a chair and various buttons. It looks as if it hasnt been used for years. You begin to wonder if your parents knew about this. You spot the power cord hanging down the side of the machine and plug it in. Surprisingly the thing powers up and comes to life! You then have a seat and look at the display. Its confusing at first, so you decide what the hell and press a couple of random buttons. You laugh for a moment, you obviously are just really bored now. Suddenly, the machines motor starts to rev and shake. All you can think is, "Oh shit" and before you can even move, you disappear in a bright flash, leaving no trace of you behind whatsoever! Now you are going somewhere, which is...

((Remember where ever you end up at, you will automatically be 2cm in height there. Good luck!))
1.title: Your adventure begins

11.content: You slowly wake up. You are surrounded by long hairy "stems". You see great mammoth objects in the distance. Realizing this unfamiliar place is in fact very familiar, your own living room, and that the "stems" are merely carpet fibers, you...
11.title: In the living room of your own house

111.content:
Chris looks around his now massive living room and decides to begin exploring. As he begins walking, he uses his arms to spread apart the thick carpet fibers, so he can move about easier. His head just barely peaks out above the carpet fibers, allowing him to see in every direction. He looks around at the massive furniture, which seems miles away, he decides to make his way towards the couch.

As he slowly struggles through the thick carpeting, he begins to hear thunderous booms coming from another room behind him. He slowly becomes scared as he turns to see what is making those booming noises. As he turns, he sees his half asleep dad walk into the living room from the hallway. The 6'2", average built, 44 year old is nothing more than a titan to the tiny 18 year old. He is wearing a white T-shirt and a pair of red plaid PJ pants and is barefoot, the classic dad PJ outfit. As his dad slowly walks into the living room, Chris feels butterflies in his stomach as he realizes the immense danger in his situation. He fully turned to his dad and decided to try to get his attention. He began waving his arms, which blended in with the carpet stems, and screaming.

"DAD! DAD I'M DOWN HERE!! I'M DOWN HERE!!!"

Chris' tiny pleas for help went unheard as his massive, unaware dad slowly walked across the living room, casually scanning the room for the remote in the process.

"DAD! HELP ME! HELP ME!! AAHHHH!"

*CRUNCH*

As Chris screamed at his giant dad, his smelly, bare sole filled his view. The massive, meaty foot landed on Chris in a casual step, smashing him into the carpet. His dad continued slowly walking to the couch, grabbing the remote from the side table as he proceeded to sit down. He set his feet up and turned on the morning news, unaware that he just stepped on his 18 year old son.
111.title: Exploration Cut Short

12.content:
you open your eyes and see https://i.pinimg.com/originals/83/f9/81/83f981754bfc5054306f96cafe2c8c8d.jpg
you instantly recognise her from her pictures, you see she has a pink bra and lacy thong on, suddenly she leans over you and sits down on you sticking you to her sweaty ass as she puts on yoga pants then sits back down to put on boots, with 30 minutes left she puts on her makeup and leaves her house, but suddenly her mom stops her and marches her back into the house and spanking her (hitting you into her ass) as she walks then she said "Madison you're grounded so why did you think it was a good idea to leave the house,you are still grounded for another month" With that Madison went to her room stripped down to her bra and panties, then laid on her bed and messaged you (but your phone was in your room) saying she was unavailable today suddenly you popped off her ass and stood on her giant ass cheek, suddenly her sweat made you slip right into her ass crack, you landed on her thong when suddenly, she farted on you, the smell was awful then she felt an itch (you) and scratched her anus, pushing you into the thong and the thong into the label, then Madison said "stupid label" "ahh there we go much better well time too sleep", with that she turned over trapping you but you manage to activate the remote and it teleports you....

13.content:
You open your eyes and wake up on a dusty, tiled floor. You arent sure where you are at since your vision is a bit blurry. The air around you smells a bit odd, yet familiar. Its a mixture of stale, beer, feet, some kind of body fragrance, and spoiled milk. Obviously whoever lives here either must not have time to keep up with keeping the place clean, or is just a total flat out slob. Your vision starts to clear and you look around your surroundings. It seems that you have ended up in somebodys living room. Only thing is, Everything is freaking huge! Judging by all the books stacked onto the coffee table and posters hanging on the wall, it looks like some sort of dorm room to you.

"This cant be right. I gotta be dreaming!" You said. Suddenly you hear what sounds like a door slamming shut. Followed by the sound of footsteps which grow louder and heavier each time. You gasp and quickly turn around. The person who lives in this dorm room has returned. Taking a few steps back, you see
13.title: In a college students dorm room

131.content:
A stunning 24 year old girl with black hair looms over you. She's wearing a black tank top that showcases her humongous breasts (they'd be huge even to a normal sized person, but they're mountains to you). She's also wearing a pair of extremely tight, semi-see through black yoga pants. You look up at her like looking up at a skyscraper.
It takes you a second to snap out of the awe you are in. By time you come to it, you realize that she is staring back at you. You are frozen with fear as this behemoth of a woman stares down at you over her massive breasts. She squats down to get a closer look at you. "Oh my god, is that a tiny man?" You couldn't speak, you were frozen in fear. She reaches her hand out and you instinctively flinch. "No no, don't worry she said". "My name is Haley," her voice booming like someone using a megaphone. She then decides to...
131.title: A 24 year old girl with black hair

15.content: Many more places you could end up
15.title: Other places

choices: Climb onto or into the shoes
152.content:
The last thing you remember was shaking and a bright light but it seems to have stopped, opening your eyes doesn't help you though as all you can see is a blinding white light, you close your eyes and turn onto your stomach so you're facing the ground, slowly you open your eyes to pet the adjust to the light.
Finally you can see and notice that whateved you've been laying on is wood but it seems alot bigger than normal, rolling back onto your back and then sitting up you take in your surroundings.
You are sitting on the edge of a massive wooden board and before you is an entire classroom but scaled up by 100%, turning around to see where you are you notice that you're in a shoe cubby and infront of you is a pair of colossal black dress shoes!
Frightened you back up a step but are reminded of your predicament as you stumble and almost fall off the edge, the cubby that you're in is 4 cubbies up and a fall from here would definately kill you.
Judging by the size of the two imposing shoes behind you youf height lies at around half an inch tall, you could risk the fall to the hard white linoleum floor below by attempting to climb down or you could take thd much more safe approach of climbing onto or into one of the shoes and waiting for the giantess that owns them to put them on the ground.
152.title: A.schoolgirl's shoes

choices: Stay put and wait for someone else
Walk off randomly to find someone
1523.content: You risk the fall and you close your eyes and step off as you fall you land with a thud you think your dead but you realize that you ate still alive, 'that fall should have killed me' you think. You then look up and see a giantess infront of you, she takes her shoes out of her cubby and drop them onto you. She puts them on and walks off you are still alive and stuck on the floor, you peal yourself off the floor and realize you are immortal and indestructible, now you say fuck it I want to have some fun!
1523.title: Something else

15231.content:
With your new indestructibility in mind you decide to fulfil a fetish you always had, to be small around giantesses. Of course, you could've done that before but your life was far more important than any fetish but without life in the picture, you could be squished and sat on and all sorts of things without dying. You decide to stay near the shoe rack waiting for another pair of shoes to come by.


You could tell you were at a school due to the shoe cubby and that it was either class time or before/after school, although you thought it was more likely to be class time due to a girl just taking her shoes and no one else being nearby. Thankfully, you didn't have to wait long as a black-haired girl was running into the building, seemingly right towards you. She stopped one cubby over and quickly took off her shoes, before dropping another pair of shoes right beside you.

With not a moment to think, you climbed onto the shoe and hung on to the top. Not a moment later, her foot slid into the shoe and she was off. You surprisingly held on with little effort, revealing strength was included with your mysterious shrinkage. On the way to her destination, you absently noted in your mind that her feet smelt nice. She ran into a room and started talking a language you didn't understand but you knew what it was, Japanese.

The lady teacher at the front talked back in an accusatory tone, before sighing and talking in a neutral tone. You assumed the conversation went something along the lines of the girl apologizing for being late, the teacher admonishing her and then telling her to go to her seat.

As if to support your argument, your current ride walked through the aisles of seats and finally got to hers at the back. She sat down and put her feet flat on the ground, giving you a chance to hop off, so you did. You looked around and saw 3 options. You could either climb the girl who had just brought you into the room, go to another girl to climb her or go all the way to the front to have some fun with the teacher.
15231.title: Having Fun!

choices: Go into this girls shoe and stay with her.
Wait for class to end and find someone else.
152312.content:
You decide to switch rides, you look around and you find a girl who catches your eye, she looks around 19 years old with shoulder length blonde hair and she seems to be the only one that you've seen that speaks English.

You notice that you are on the opposite side of the room and she's by the door, you decide to run for her.

After almost the whole class time you make it to her with about 5 more mins before the class ends.

What do you do?
152312.title: Switching Rides.

choices: It's the teacher coming in to prepare for the lesson
It's the first student who's early to class

153.content:
Your head hurts a bit and you feel dizzy, as you slowly get into a sitting position on what ever hard surface your laying on, holding a hand to your head with eyes still closed. Slowly open your eyes, but have to cover them due to a bright light above you, and slowly allow them to adjust and focus. All you can see are metal bars, the area is very spacious with a really high ceiling, and a solid hard floor so maybe your in a hanger of some sort. Walking a bit to find some one who can help, you find a weird field of fiber grass that comes up to about you knees. Wading though it for a few minutes you come to a wall.

Looking up there seems to be a sign of some kind, looking up you can't believe it, it's a gigantic kids drawing. Looking back the way you came the metal bars turned out to be desk legs, near you a wooden structure with apartment size holes is the cubbyhole shelving, and in a further corner a play a area with huge toys. Judging by the size of the objects around, you have to be only 2cm tall.
G
You don't have enough time to take it all in, before the door on the far end opens, and a gigantic figure walks in.

Who is it?
153.title: A kindergarten class

Once the light dies down, Chris removes his hands from from his face, and looks around at his surroundings.Definitely not still in the basement, but where am I?

All around I can see glass tanks filled with colorful liquid. Walking though the tank maze, I find an exit, and my heart stops. This looks like a giant shop, but that's impossible, at this size I'd only be about 2cm tall. Looking closer at the tanks gigantic writing on them say it's nail polish, further over huge chairs for getting your feet done, and the sitting area for have your nails done on the other size. I must be on a tray the workers use to carry the colors on, in the nail salon. A loud bell ring brings attention to a group of women entering though a door.

Who are they?

Going down your going to end up in the dark pit of his mouth. Using your arms you try and move away from the mouth, but only end up landing on his bottom lip. Before you can move his mouth closes, trapping you between his heavy lips. You try and squirm free but your stuck. Movement out of the corner of your left eye has you look over. He has stuck his tongue between his lips and it's moving straight for you. The lips hold you in place and the large, wet, pink appendage slams into you. The wetness of his saliva has you stuck to the tongue. His lips open and the tongue retracts back into the mouth with you on it. Once the lips close, casting you into darkness, the tongue presses you into the roof of the mouth. It moves you around like he's sucking on you. The tongue released you to fall into a pool of saliva under the tongue. The boys tongue presses down on you as you hear a gulping sound and the saliva level drops. He had just swallowed the saliva. The tongue pushes under you and rolls you into it center on top of it. His lips open and you take that chance to get up and run towards the exit.

155331.content:
You rematerialize in a vast green jungle. The air around you is very cool and fresh. For a while you are trying to put yourself back together and figure out what just happened.

"Oh man where am I?" You said as you hold your head and walk around a little. All you remember is that machine going off and you completely blacking out. At least you're still alive anyways. As you observe the enviroment you feel something isnt right. These are the weirdest looking trees growing from the ground. You touch them and realize they are clearly not made of wood. In fact they feel a little flimsy as you can move them around with your body. A few seconds pass and it hits you, These arent trees. these are really big pieces of grass that surround you!

"Holy crap! Im the size of a bug and trapped in a grass lawn!" You say to yourself! Just then you feel the ground starting to shake beneath your feet a bit. Followed by a heavy hum that seems to gradually grow louder and louder by the second. You decide to get to higher grounds and take a better look at whats going on. You grab onto what looks like a huge white pole and make your way up. The surface is a rigid design so you're able to grab onto it with ease. When you reach the top of the pole you are now above the grass and able to see where you are really at. It is much hotter up here as the sun beats down on you from the clear skys. This place appears to be a vast field that has some patches of sand and small bumps. There are several skyscraper sized poles with flags sticking out from the ground in various spots. Also in the far distance you can spot what appears to be people with golf clubs. If then occurs to you that this must be a golf course. A really big golf course. And the object you are standing on now is actually a golf tee!

"Oh man I have to be dreaming." You tell yourself. You then hear that loud humming noise again coming from behind you. Looking back, you see that its actually a huge black golf cart coming your way! The sound of its electric motor running was causing the noise. As it nears you fast, You shudder and think its going to run you over but instead the cart stops right beside you. Opening your eyes you notice a massive hand reaching down for the golf tee you're on! Darkness falls upon you fast as the hand clasps around the tee and rips it out of the soil. You feel yourself being lifted and placed inside of a bag. Now trapped in complete darkness, all you can do is hang on until,
155331.title: A golf course

Inside an empty nike golf shoe

Light then pours inside of the bag as all the tees are dumped out including you. You scream as you slide out in an avalanche of golf tees and onto a counter, nearly being crushed numerous times! You get back onto your feet, dazed but alright for now.

"Eeeeww....." you then hear a womans voice say. Suddenly a huge hand sweeps you off the counter before you even have a chance to see who it is!

"Ahhhhh!!!" You scream as you fall blindily! You have no idea where you will land now but you prepare for the end anyways. Instead, you end up falling..
1553312.title: The person is returning the equiptment

You land with a small thud on a soft surface. The first thing that hits you is a strong terrible smell! You get back onto your feet and look around your surroundings. It takes you a few seconds but you then immediatly realize you have just fallen inside of somebodys shoe! Its a golf shoe by nike according to the tag on the side of the lining. You get a very faint whiff of some kind of womens frangerance lingering somewhere within the musky sweaty odor so you also assume these shoes probably belong to a female. You can also see the huge molding created by the owners feet and toes indicating that these have been worn definitely to more than one outing! You have no idea how you're going to get out of here but you know it better be soon!

Just then you feel the surface shake several times beneath your feet. A voice is heard followed by the shadow of a person overtaking you! You then see the woman is getting ready to put the shoes on now! And it isnt just any woman, its
15533122.title: In someones shoe

choices: decides to head to the bathroom and check to see what the pebble is
decides to ignore it and play's another round with Stacy Prammanasudh
decides to ignore it and go home
155331221.content:
...none other then Natalie G. you recognize that blonde haired beauty anywhere. This would be so cool if you weren't about to become very friendly with her insole. You do your best to attempt a yell but as soon as the sneaker is picked up, your flung backwards towards the toe section of the shoe. It seem's the deeper you got the more intense the smell. It was awful but not as bad as what was to come.

Natalie's socked foot enters the shoe, trapping you inside with it. The humidity that was now growing with awful smell that already existed made you wish that you just watched TV all day instead of finding that dumb machine. You were being put through torture and tried your best to pound on the side of the foot to get the giantess golfers attention. But this only led to her wiggle or foot to lose her discomfort. Which caused you to become right under her toes.

While in the position of walking out her front door Natalie feel's some sort of very small pebble that lodged itself under her toes. But knowing she was already pressing for time she ignored it and headed for her match that she had setup today. Her agent set up match with Stacy Prammanasudh. They have met before in a torment that they have done. And both had made a bet that had big winnings for the winner.

It takes a while her to make it to the match and you just had to endure the whole ride. Which wasn't that bad in till Natalie arrived on a hot day to her match. The inside of the sneaker grew a smell that could be considered toxic and it didn't help being dripped on by the toes that were above you. A small crowd did come out to watch and two girls greet one another. And the match began, Natalie at first was a bit nervous especially now with have to deal with a pebble in her shoe. But with the grip of her toes tighten around you she actually scores a birdie. Afterwards the match went great it was one her best yet and she had a feeling that the pebble in her shoe was lucky.

Plus it felt pretty good in there. Stacy was upset the whole game and originally thought she had this in the bag but once it ended. Stacy was forced to admit defeat. At this point you were covered in foot sweat and now just tolerate the terrible smell. Not to say that you don't ant to get away from the smell but you have learned to tolerate it.

After the match Natalie thought about the pebble for a sec and was curious about how it looked like or even if it is a pebble. But she really wasn't sure if she wanted to take off her shoe right now.
155331221.title: Natalie Gulbis's shoe pebble

1553312211.content:
She needed to see what her lucky pebble looked like right away. And so she makes her way to the bathroom and heads straight for a stall and locks it. Removing her shoe light begins to pour in followed by fresh....bathroom stall air flows in. That was for sure better then your previous position. Your surprised as the shoe is lifted and you see the gigantic face of Natalie. Seeing you she was surprised t the strange looking pebble that sort of looks alive. "Ewww... please don't tell me your a bug...." Natalie says as she reaches her gloved hand in to grab you.

After what you just dealt with you really had little strength to even fight back the intense hand strength of the girl. Once out she opens her hand and your greeted with Natalie's gigantic face much closer this time. You get a smell of sweat mixed with whatever perfume she was wearing. You do your best to wave and say "Hey....". And seeing your little wave and the way you look shes a bit taken back by her pebble being a tiny man. And was also not able to hear what you were saying only slight squeaks.

She then hears the bathroom door open. Followed by Stacy P's voice saying "Nat I want a rematch right now. Come on double or nothing". Hearing this Natalie was bit upset since she sort of wanted to call it and also this.... remembering you again Natalie smile's. She then yells over "Okay fine Stacy just let me finish up in here". Happy with what she said Stacy say's while leaving "Okay just hurry up girl" *door shut*.

Natalie turns her attention back to you, she say's "Uh... listen I have to test something okay. I just had one of the best matches of my life and I need to see... if that was because of you. I figure your probably wanting me to help you in someway. Or maybe this is some perverted thing your doing. But we can talk about that later. I just need to put you back in my shoe while I play another round with Stacy. You might be some kind of lucky little guy haha. So, I know it might be bad in there but...." Really not knowing how to end her sentence she just dumps you back into her shoe and flings you towards the toe section while putting it back on.

Satisfied with the feeling of you. She heads out to face Stacy. While you try to comprehend what the heck just happen to you. With great confusion you also get a bad feeling that if Natalie win's. Your future might not be to good....

(What happens?)
1553312211.title: A test of your future

Your life is pretty normal, you go to high school at "Cat High". You have a family that loves you, some good friends and an awesome girlfriend.

The question is now: Where?

Will you shrink near your classmates? and try to survive the hot girls from your class!

or

Will you try and survive your smoking hot Girlfriend? shrinking in her apartment, and hoping you wont be mistaken for a bug!

You just started in High school, but it is already going pretty great. You have a lot of friends, and a few best ones. Your class is pretty great socially, partying a lot and everyone getting along. Your two best friends are Josie and Dave, they are both nerdy like you. Josie is a big Harry Potter fan, and thats what you bonded over. There are other girls in your class that will be revealed when the story starts.


Your next choice will be choosing where the story starts. After this chapter the story will be in first-person.

At a party- everyone is drunk, and no one will think about where you went when you shrink. People wont be thinking straight, and there will be drinking games.

In class- You meet in early, and suddenly everthing changes when you shrink, you gotta find someone who can help you.

or

155332111.title: At a party

1553321112.content:
I wake up...

I look around. I passed out yesterday at the party after getting a weird drink. I cant make out where I am. it seems like a cave. There are some light coming from an opening in the celling further up the cave. I feel around the walls, they are soft, but not like a pillow, more like a carpet. The floor seems to be made of something a little soft too. The smell in this cave is horrid! It smells kinda cheesy, a sour smell. I spot a rope further up, hanging down from the opening. I must be able to climb up the road and find out where I am. But how could I have ended up in this mysterious cave? I mean I drank a lot last night, but i never remember leaving the party. I grab the rope, and start climbing. I look up from the cave, there seems to be a wooden celling above me, and its kilometers up in the sky. Where am I?

I climb to the top and a chill goes down my spine when I realise where I am. I stop for a moment, pinching myself. This can't be true! The cave wasn't a cave, but a SHOE! I am as small as an ant. I crawled up the shoelace hanging down in the shoe, and the horrid smell was from the foot that the shoe belonged to. But whos shoe is it? Where am I? And what do I do now?

Will I stay in the shoe, and hope the owner spots me?

or

Will I go exploring this room in search of help?
1553321112.title: The hot girl, parties are boring anyway

15533211122.content:
I climb down the giant sneakers and onto the floor. I can see that I am in a girls room. The shoes i was in, are standing in front of an open closet with clothes in. There are several pairs of shoes standing next to the sneakers. A pair of sandals, high heels and more. This clothes and these shoes all seem familiar. I must be in one of my classmates home. Standing there thinking I suddenly hear loud booms coming from outside the door to the room. I look at the bed, there is no one in it. How long did I sleep? The girl that lives here, must already have woken up. I am just glad she wasn't gonna use the sneakers before I woke up.

The door handle moves down and the door slowly opens. I look as if I am in a trance at the door. A giant blonde slim girl enters the room. It is Sally from my class! She is only dressed in underwear. I stare at this giantess. She is enormous compared to me! I have to get her attention. She is my only hope. But first I will enjoy the sight of her half-naked body. Sally then looks in my direction. Of course! I am right in front of the clothing closet. She then starts walking towards me. What do I do?

Keep standing here in front of the sneakers?

or

Run away to not be stepped on?
15533211122.title: Go exploring

155332111221.content:
Get her attention?

or

Just stand and watch?
155332111221.title: Stand still

155332111222.content:
I start running as Sally walks over to the closet. I run for the bed, maybe if I hide under it, I will be safe until I can make my move later.
As I start running I see Sally standing still in front of the closet, picking out clothes to wear for the day. She seems to be distracted be the clothes. I am halfway to the bed, where I will be safe. As I run I keep looking behind me to see if Sally is done picking out her clothes. Suddenly a message tone beeps from her mobile lying on her bed. Sally looks instantly at the phone. She then walks towards it, and I look in terror as Sally's feet are nearing me. I run faster to not be stepped on by those massive bare soles. Sally foot raises over me, and I see the shadow cover me. She then steps down in front of me, and proceeds to walk to the phone. I stand still for a moment, as I had just looked death in the eye. Sally is checking her phone and I am not far away from her, being this close to the bed I can't give up. I start running again, and that is when I hear Sally say something that sends chills down my spine. "Ew what is that there on the floor? Oh gross! I think it is a bug!" Sally says looking disgusted at me. I run faster in fear for this giantess ending my life. Sally takes one step towards me and then raises her foot she then smashes the bare foot down on me. Her shadow over me, the smooth bare sole covering my view. Then there is darkness as her foot hits the floor. I am between her toes! Alive! I then climb quickly up her foot, to get her attention. She sees me. "EW EW EW! this is so gross the insect is on me!" Sally screams while looking down at me. Sally's other foot then comes down to smear me out on the foot I am standing on. I jump and Sally's other foot kicks me off her foot and I fly to the floor. Sally looks down at me. Her towering view, with her disgusted look in her face, makes me feel insignificant to her. She raises her foot again. "This time I will get you, little bug. God I hate having you in my room!" Sally says as her foot steps down on me and smear me to a bloody stain on her foot.

Sally twist her foot in disgust as she breaks every bone in your body. She then wipes the bloody stain you left on her foot of in her carpet.
155332111222.title: Run away!

155332112.content:
I walk into the classroom one early monday morning.

The classroom is empty, I am the first one to be here. I put my bag down and take off my jacket. It is weird, there always seems to be someone arriving earlier than me. I take out a chair and sit down. I look through my phone while i wait for someone to arrive.

Suddenly I hear a buzzing sound next to my right ear. it must be a mosquito. I try to smack it with my hand, but I miss. The mosquito flies to my arm and pluck its trunk down my flesh. I squash it finally and it is over, but then i feel dizzy...

I stand up, needing some fresh air. I walk to the door, but it seems so far away. I bend down on my knees and fall over. WTF did that mosquito do to me? I lie there on the floor feeling the worst I have ever felt. The celling seems so big and the lights so bright. I pass out...


I wake up probably 5 minutes after, and i sit up. I still feel like shit, but i survived whatever happened to me. I try to concentrate about getting up and stand. My vision is blurry and I dont really know what is happening. I feel the floor shake. I try looking around for what could be making the earth rumble, but my vision is too blurry. I walk to the nearest wall i can seem to see. I still feel the booming from the floor, but ignore it. Then i hear a loud creaking and a voice saying: "Hallo is anybody there? Hmm I guess I am the first one to arrive." I am right here i yell back, but i get no answer. I recognise the voice, it is one of my best friends Josie. She usually is the first one to be at the school.

What should I do? walk towards Josie and talk to her, or wait here at the wall and find out why she is not responding?
155332112.title: In class

1553321121.content:
I must get to Josie so she can help me. I need to get some help, maybe be taken to a hospital.

I walk towards the booming, because it must be Josie, maybe she is angry and therefore stomping around. My vision must be really blurry, because it looks like the classroom is much bigger than it is. But why has she not spoken to me yet? maybe she is pranking me, probably noticing my blindness. I seem to see something move in the distance, and then the booming gets louder. It must be Josie playing with me. She probably is going to surprise me, with the stomping and then coming from behind.

I walk to the booming sounds and the thing i presume is my friend is getting bigger and bigger. i rub my eyes and it seems to help a little. I see the thing in front of me, lifting up and then coming back down. It looks brown and pink. This isn't Josie, this thing has gotten 5 legs...maybe aliens have come to earth! I walk closer to the massive 5-legged beast. It moves towards me and i slowly step back, then i hear the voice again: "Better do some homework while i still have the peace and quiet." The voice sounded like Josie again. This couldn't be! Is she here with that monster in front of me? What is it? I rub my eyes again and it all becomes clearer. I look up. I look at the thing. I almost faint realising what the thing is. I start running immediately, so i wont be crushed.

I look back at my now ginormous friend! THE MOSQUITO SHRUNK ME!!
The monster i saw was Josie, or to be more correct her foot. I should have stayed at the wall, cause Josie is walking towards me, and at her height i will be a stain under her sandal at any moment. I see a shadow appear over me and I run even faster. I look back and watch as the sole of the sandal is coming down.

What do i do? Try to dodge the sandal by running to the side or straight ahead?
1553321121.title: Go to Josie

15533211211.content:
I decide to run straight forward, hoping to outrun my friends foot.

I see the shadow slowly lowering down upon me. I feel the air from behind as Josie's foot hits the floor. I am thrown across the floor from the blowing of the air. I land on my back looking up, seeing Josie still going my direction. I look up at her face. Her brown big hair surrounding her face as it turns towards me. She looks down at me, and I think I am saved. She first looks with pity and then.....disgust, as she says: "EW EW EW a disgusting bug! GOD I hate insects, at least I will spare the world for this one. Goodbye little bug." Josie raises her foot over me, and with a satisfied smile she lowers her foot and crush me.

As Josie twist her sandal clad foot with the smeared bloody remains of our main character under she smiles, satisfied that this "insect" will not be bugging her ;)
15533211211.title: Run straight forward

choices: You reach her before they arrive
15533211212.content:
I dodge to the side, and watch as the giant foot, smashes down into the ground in front of me, sending a stream of air right at me. I fly back landing on my back, watching as my giant friend walks over to her seat. I shake all over and try to gather my senses. I have to get her attention, but something is refusing me to move. I try and get up, but my body wont let me. I take a moment to breath in and out. I look up at Josie. She is enormous! She twirls her big brown long hair around a finger, sitting there thinking about something. She is wearing a pair of brown sandals, black pants and a blue shirt. She is sitting with her back to me, doing homework on her computer. I have to get her help, there is no one else here, and I am too small to go other places, and if there is anyone i trust its Josie.

I get back up on my feet. I start walking. At my size a couple of meters is a long distance, and I am beginning to doubt, that I can reach her before my other classmates arrive. Hopefully i wont be trampled down. Walking here on the floor i realise something. I am so small that Josie did not even realise I was on the floor, when she walked in the classroom. I also realise another thing, I am as small as an insect, and might as well be mistaken as one. Now heart rate rises.

The question now is, do I reach Josie before my other classmates arrive?

or

Do they arrive before I get to her?
15533211212.title: Run to the side

155332112122.content:
I suddenly hear voices from outside the classroom, and that is when I start running.I look back to see my classmates walk in the door. For them this may be a quiet morning, with nothing happening, but for me, this is life or death. As they all start arriving I dodge giant shoes unaware of me beneath them, and all this time i try running for Josie. I almost get stepped on a couple of times, but I was lucky enough to dodge out of the way. Then I hear the bell ring, and that means everyone must be seated. I run around making sure I am in no ones path, and when everyone sits down and the teacher walks in I stop. I stop to catch my breath. I am not far from Josie's chair, but with everyone else here, maybe there would be someone better to get help from.

And then a thought enter my head. Its been creeping there since the beginning, but I thought it would be stupid. It is my only chance though, and who says I will ever gro big again? Maybe while trying to get someones attention, I might have some fun. I have a thing for feet and have always loved giantess-porn, so maybe I could explore that now. Maybe just play around a little. But I still need to get help! But from who?

Will I go with my original plan and go to Josie?

or

Will I choose someone else from my class?
155332112122.title: You just weren't fast enough

1553321121221.content:
Josie still sat there, doing her homework as others filed into class. You had two choices: you could either try and head for her feet, then either climb up them or try to get her attention from there; or you could try to scale a chair leg, squeeze in through the chair back, and try to mount her from the much easier (and possibly safer) position of her rear end.

Which do you choose?

Choice One -- You go for the feet, because you are a total podophile. However, your love of feet may lead to Josie noticing you...as a bug.

Choice Two -- You climb the chair leg and get between Josie's butt and the back of the chair. However, while Josie will not notice this, ...well, she won't notice it. And you may find her shifting in her seat...
1553321121221.title: Josie (she was your first choice)

1553321121222.content:
Okay someone else maybe would be a better choice, but would it be?

I look around the classroom, there are a lot of options. I dont think I am going to go to a boy for help, since the girls will probably be gentler with me, and perhaps take care of me, if I go to the right one. I look for those closest to me. I see that next to Josie, Chloe is sitting. The other closest girl would be Sally sitting behind Josie. If I wanted to go a little further there would also be the choice to try getting Zoe's attention. A little further to me is next to Sally. There is also another choice that would be more risky I could go with. I am not sure it would work, but I could try going for my teacher Nellie, when she is walking around the class. She is an adult, and would probably be the best, at dealing with my situation, but probably the hardest getting to.

Now I just have to make a choice, which of these girls will I be trying to get the attention of?

Chloe: Light-brown long hair, flats, black skirt, red shirt with a denim jacket on top. Chloe is a good friend of yours, she can be quite goofy, but usually you enjoy her humor.

Sally:long blonde hair, white sneakers, blue jeans, tight grey turtleneck. Sally is really hot, and before you got together with your girlfriend, you had a huge crush on Sally. She can be a little snobby sometimes, but mostly she is really kind.

Zoe: long curly black hair, flip flops, black jeans, blue and white checkered shirt. Zoe is popular and I dont really know her that well, she seems nice, even though I have never really spoken to her, Oh and she is also really goddamn hot!

Nellie: shoulder-length brown hair, high heels, black jeans, white shirt with a leather jacket on top. Nellie (my english teacher) is quite good looking for a woman in her early thirties, she always makes our classes fun, compared to some of the other teachers. Nellie freaks out every time there is a bug i the classroom, but she is very sweet otherwise.
1553321121222.title: Someone else from the class

15533211212221.content:
Which woman will you choose?

Chloe and stay next to Josie?

or

Nellie and challenge faith?
15533211212221.title: Chloe or Nellie?

15533211212222.content:
Which of the girls will you choose?

Sally and not go that far?

or

Zoe and go a little further?
15533211212222.title: Sally or Zoe?

choices: Go to your Girilfriends house (and be a good boyfriends)
Be disloyal and go to the friends house
15533212.content: Are you sure? You could also shrink accidentally at one of your girlfriends friend's house ;)
15533212.title: Girlfriend

155332122.content:
OR!!! go to the house of one of your own friends?

What will you choose? to bro (and hope his mothers not home) out or get closer to one of your girlfriends friends?
155332122.title: Be disloyal and go to the friends house

15533222222.content: R u sure? Or no?
15533222222.title: Somewhere in nature..

choices: The house of the cute girl u have a crush on
155332222222.title: Other

info.brief_description: Now you can shrink wherever you want!
info.description: You discover a strange machine in your basement that not only transports you to different places, but shrinks you down to 2 centimeters in height! You can also travel back to different time periods as well. Everything is pretty much allowable with the exception of underage/hardcore sex and toilet scenes. Giant males are allowed as long as its in a separate branch! Thanks and have fun
